medium: Black chalk with traces of white of gray paper
title: Study of Hands and Drapery (recto); Study of Chest and Arms of a Seated Cleric (verso)
description: recto:  two sketches--at left, PR hand and drapery sleeve; at right, PL hand holding drapery in folds on shoulder and PL arm; verso:  midsection of seated figure with PL hand resting on chair arm
